about.title: About me
text: I'm Saqib Waheed, a passionate React Native Developer with 1.5+ years of hands-on experience in building cross-platform mobile applications for e-commerce, AI, and real-time communication platforms. I specialize in React Native CLI, Firebase, WebSockets, and AI integrations, with a strong focus on clean code, performance optimization, and delivering seamless user experiences.

Throughout my career journey, I've worked on diverse projects ranging from AI-powered travel planners to secure proctoring systems and full-stack e-commerce platforms. I hold a Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering from National University of Modern Languages, Islamabad (2021-2024).

My professional experience includes working as a Software Engineer at Global Network Creativity Technology (January 2025 - Present), where I've integrated HLS video playback and built video upload workflows with Wasabi S3. Prior to that, I served as a React Native Developer at X Apparel Private Ltd. (January 2024 - December 2024), where I developed cross-platform mobile applications, integrated Firebase and WebSockets, and improved app performance by 15%. I also completed an internship at the same company (October 2023 - December 2023), gaining hands-on experience in React Native, Expo, Firebase, and API integration.

testimonials.name: Bilal Maqsood, X Apparel Pvt Ltd. Manager
testimonials.text: Saqib transformed our app with a sleek, user-friendly design and optimized performance. His problem-solving skills and attention to detail were outstanding!.

testimonials.name: Muhammad Hamza, X Apparel Pvt Ltd. CEO
testimonials.text: Professional, efficient, and always ready to tackle challenges. Saqib played a crucial role in improving our e-commerce app's functionality.

testimonials.name: Umer Toor, GitLogix Manager
testimonials.text: Working with Saqib was a great experience. He built a high-performing mobile application that met all our expectations and beyond!.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Integrated HLS video playback (.m3u8) in React Native and web apps, enabling smooth adaptive streaming on iOS and Android. Built video upload workflows with Wasabi S3 and streaming APIs, improving content delivery efficiency by 30%. Developed TripBrain Planner AI, a travel app with Gemini API for smart recommendations, maps, and itinerary generation. Optimized UI/UX responsiveness and app performance, reducing load times by 20%.

experience.description: Developed and maintained cross-platform mobile applications using React Native.

experience.title: React Native Internship
experience.description: During my internship, I gained a solid understanding of React Native's basic concepts, including component-based development, state management, navigation, and API integration. I worked on building and optimizing mobile applications, enhancing my skills in cross-platform development.
